meanings.definition: A small, flat, folding case for carrying paper money, credit cards, and identification.
meanings.sent1: My dad keeps his money and cards in his wallet.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy a new wallet to keep my cash safe.
meanings.sent3: When the wallet saw the credit card, it blushed.
meanings.sent4: Her wallet was a treasure trove of memories and cash.
meanings.sent5: The wallet bulged with coins and bills, ready for spending.

meanings.definition: A pocket-sized, flat, folding case for holding money and plastic cards.
meanings.sent1: She reached for her wallet to pay for the groceries.
meanings.sent2: His wallet was so full, it could barely close.
meanings.sent3: The wallet and the keys had a race to see who would be found first.
meanings.sent4: The wallet whispered secrets of spending wisely.
meanings.sent5: In her wallet, she kept a photo of her family for good luck.
